caption: The video begins with two women engaging in intense hand-to-hand combat in a laboratory, ending with both collapsing to the ground, severely injured. The second part of the video shows a man and a woman at home sifting through what appears to be files on suspects, seemingly trying to crack a case. They look for clues in the files but are unable to find some, prompting them to leave the house to continue their search. However, as they depart, they realize they are being followed by a policeman. Fortunately, the policeman is soon distracted by some thugs, allowing them to evade further surveillance. The third segment of the video features a father and son on a passenger plane, who sneak away to the center of the cabin while the pilot is distracted. There, they find a small aircraft. They board this aircraft and detach from the interior of the larger plane, flying off on their own.
